issue.title: [Go] Aligned Bitmap Ops mess up the final byte if no trailing bits
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17467](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17467). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
when (offset + length%8) == 0 the BitmapAnd and BitmapOr mask out the entire last byte.
